lines.text: Well, what'ya know! Saint Nicolas! What you know, Nick?
Oh, er... Merry Christmas, my little man. He he he he. I'm sure you've been a very good little boy this year, haven't you?
He don't know me very well, do he, folks?
Well, I cannot heckle that wolf anymore 'til he get back, so I might as well heckle you people out there.
[pulls out a blackboard and screeches on it with chalk]
I sure is a mean widdle kid, ain't I?
Junior, you got a whipping coming to you.

[gives mother a gift box]
And you got a present coming to you. Merry Christmas, Mommy.
[puts it on; it has the same tail as the wolf]
Why, this coat is just what I need.

[comes in naked, grabs fur coat]
You and me both, sister. He he he he he!
Stop! Don't come in here! This will be entirely too gruesome to witness! Keep your distance! Get back!
